children.text:
About

This program will help you relax by playing some ambient sounds who are looped and will play forever.
You can choose from the list, click on the checkbox to enable the sound, what you would like to hear.
You can also enable multiple sounds and set there independent volume level.
This way you can create your own unique ambient relax melody to start relaxing.
Use the big volume bar on the bottom to regulate the main volume for all playing sounds. The main volume is connected to the default media volume, so you can also use the volume hardware buttons.

Favorites

Click on the star right of the sound you like.
The sound will be moved to the top of the list.
This way you can easily access all of your favorite sounds without scrolling.
Click on the star again to unpin it from the top of your list.

Presets

You can also save the melody preset by clicking on presets in the menu.
In this screen you can save your creation in one of the preset-slots.
Click on one of the save buttons to save your creation.
You can later on click on one of the load buttons to load your previously saved creation.

Timer

If you are using this program to fall asleep you can use the timer.
Click on the set timer button to let this program fade and quit itself after a period of time with the countdown function.
You can also set an alarm on a specific time to wake up.
No battery will be drained after the application has quit itself, so you can easily fall asleep.

Fading

If you use the countdown fade function, the sound will 'fade out' over a three minute time period.
The fading is depending on the main volume.
Setting the main volume high will give a better fading experience, setting the main volume low will fade to zero very fast.

Sleep Bot Track Log

If you have this application installed on your device and would like to punch-in and out without leaving relax and sleep, you can check the use sleep bot track log checkbox on the alarm-tab.
The alarm will then punch-in when activated and punch-out when you stop the alarm after it went off.
You need to install this application separately (search the market for 'sleep bot').

Magic Shake

With the help of the magic shake function you can create a randomly selected ambient sound.
Just click the magic shake button and shake your device.
The button is located on thebottom, it's a magic wand.
A random sound will be created while shaking.
You can toggle the magic shake function off to prevent the shake function from working while using the device.

Phonecall

If you make or accept a phone call all sounds will be put on mute.
Tip be sure to save your creation as a preset so it is easy to re-load your melody after an incoming phonecall.

Support

If you encounter any issue, want to contact the developer or like to send some fan-mail, you can send it to: relaxandsleep@mizusoft.com.
Please keep in mind that this is a free application.
We will try our best to answer your question.
You can also follow us for the latest updates or to let us know what you think!
